api/Nitrocid.Kernel.Configuration.Settin.title: Enum SettingsKeyType | Nitrocid KS API - Aptivi
api/Nitrocid.Kernel.Configuration.Settin.keywords: Enum SettingsKeyType Key type for settings entry Namespace: Nitrocid.Kernel.Configuration.Settings Assembly: Nitrocid.dll Syntax public enum SettingsKeyType Fields Name Description SBoolean The value is of bool SChar The value is of char and only accepts one character. SColor The value is of Terminaux.Colors.Color and comes from the color wheel SDouble The value is of double SFiglet The value is a Figlet font name that allows Settings to use the Figlet font selector. SIcon The value is an icon font name that allows Settings to use the icon selector. SInt The value is of int SIntSlider The value is of int, but has a slider which has a minimum and maximum value. Useful for numbers which are limited. SList The value is of System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<T>, like System.Collections.Generic.List<T> SMultivar The value consists of multiple variables. SPreset The value is a shell preset defined using IPromptPreset in Nitrocid.Shell.Prompts.PromptPresetManager.CurrentPresets SSelection The value is of the selection, which can either come from enums, or from System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<T>, like System.Collections.Generic.List<T> SString The value is of string SUnknown Unknown type

api/Nitrocid.Kernel.Exceptions.KernelExc.title: Enum KernelExceptionType | Nitrocid KS API - Aptivi
api/Nitrocid.Kernel.Exceptions.KernelExc.keywords: Enum KernelExceptionType Kernel exception types Namespace: Nitrocid.Kernel.Exceptions Assembly: Nitrocid.dll Syntax public enum KernelExceptionType Fields Name Description AddonManagement There was an error when trying to perform an operation for the kernel addon management. Alarm There was an error when trying to process an alarm system operation. AliasAlreadyExists The specified alias already exists. Make sure that you select a different alias. AliasInvalidOperation The alias system encountered an invalid operation trying to process your request. AliasNoSuchAlias The specified alias isn't found. AliasNoSuchCommand The specified command isn't found to alias to. AliasNoSuchType The specified alias type isn't found. Archive An invalid archive operation is being performed. AssertionFailure An assertion failure has been detected in the kernel! This is most likely a bug in the kernel module that should be fixed on our end. AudioCue There was an error when processing your audio cue action. Bootloader There was an error when trying to process a bootloader operation. Calendar An error occurred in the calendar manager. Color An error occurred while trying to process the color request. Common mistakes include specifying the wrong color specifier. CommandManager A general command manager error occurred. Check to make sure that you've written the command or the shell type correctly. Config A kernel configuration error occurred. Console The console operation failed to perform the required task. ConsoleReadTimeout User didn't provide any input in a timely fashion. Contacts A contacts manager error occurred when trying to perform the requested operation. Make sure that the contact file exists in the correct folder and that it's a valid vCard 2.1, 3.0, or 4.0 contact file. CustomSettings An error occurred in the custom settings manager for users. Debug An invalid debugging operation is being performed. Docking The system docking operation failed to perform the required task. DriverHandler The driver handler failed to perform this action because you might have supplied the parameters wrong. If you're sure that they're specified correctly, make sure that you've provided the right driver name and type. DriverManagement There was an error when trying to perform an operation for the kernel driver management. Encoding Encoding has failed. Check to make sure that your encoding driver works correctly and fix any problems if found, then try again. Encryption An invalid encryption operation is being performed. Environment There was an error when trying to perform an operation for the environment management. EventManagement There was an error when trying to perform an operation for the kernel event management. FTPFilesystem A general FTP filesystem error occurred. Check to make sure that the path specified is correct, and that the file or directory actually exists. FTPNetwork A general FTP network error occurred. Check to make sure that your internet connection is working. FTPShell A general FTP shell error occurred. Filesystem A general filesystem error occurred. Check to make sure that the path specified is correct, and that the file or directory actually exists. GroupManagement A group management error occurred. HTTPNetwork A general HTTP network error occurred. Check to make sure that your internet connection is working. HTTPShell A general HTTP shell error occurred. Hardware Hardware component manager failed. HexEditor An invalid hex editor operation is being performed. Homepage The homepage tools has encountered an error when trying to process your request. Please make sure that you've entered all the necessary data correctly. Hostname The kernel networking has reported an error for the hostname component. InsaneConsoleDetected Insane console has been detected. Nitrocid KS can't continue running, because your console is incompatible with our requirements. InteractiveTui An error occurred in the Interactive TUI implementation. InvalidFeed Invalid RSS feed. Ensure that you've referenced the feed correctly and try again. InvalidFeedLink Invalid RSS feed link. Ensure that you've entered the link correctly and try again. InvalidFeedType Invalid RSS feed type. Ensure that you've entered the feed type correctly and try again. InvalidHash Invalid hash sum. Check to make sure that you copied and pasted the hash sum correctly. If you're using a custom hash sum driver, check to make sure that the driver is loaded and that it works as expected. InvalidHashAlgorithm Invalid hash algorithm. If you're using a custom hash sum driver, check to make sure that the driver is loaded. InvalidKernelPath Invalid kernel path. InvalidManpage Invalid manual page. Check to make sure that the mod containing the valid manual pages is loaded. InvalidMod Invalid mod. If your mod is a valid .NET assembly, check to make sure that it actually implements the interface that is necessary to start the mod. InvalidPath Invalid filesystem path. Check to make sure that it's written correctly. InvalidPlaceholder Invalid placeholder. Consult the kernel documentation for more information. InvalidPlaceholderAction Invalid placeholder action. Consult the kernel documentation for more information. Journaling The kernel journaling operation failed to perform the required task. JsonEditor An invalid JSON editor operation is being performed. LanguageInstall The custom language failed to install. Check to make sure that the language file is correctly formed. Usually, the locale generator does a good job in making the localization information for your custom language. LanguageManagement There was an error in the language management. LanguageParse The custom language failed to load. Check to make sure that the language file is correctly formed. Usually, the locale generator does a good job in making the localization information for your custom language. LanguageUninstall The custom language failed to uninstall. LocaleGen Locale generator tool returned an error while trying to generate JSON files for languages. LoginHandler Login handler failed. Please ensure that it's registered properly and that it does its job as expected. MOTD An error occurred trying to read or set the message of the day. Mail The mail system encountered an error. ModInstall The mod failed to install. Check to make sure that it's a valid mod file. If your mod is a valid .NET assembly, check to make sure that it actually implements the interface that is necessary to start the mod. ModManagement There was an error in the mod management. ModManual An error occurred in the mod manual parser. Please ensure that your manual file is valid and that the mod is started. ModUninstall The mod uninstallation has failed. ModWithoutMod The mod contains no mod instance. Consult with the mod vendor for a new copy. Network A general network error occurred. Should you be trying to connect to a remote end, make sure that you're connected to the Internet or to your local network. NetworkConnection An error occurred in the network connection manager. NetworkOffline Your network needs to be online before being able to perform operations related to networking. Connect your network adapter and try again. NoSuchCulture There is no culture by this name. NoSuchDriver Driver doesn't exist. Check to make sure that you've written the driver name correctly, and that the driver is registered properly. NoSuchEvent There is no event by this name. NoSuchGroup Group doesn't exist. Check to make sure that you've written the group name correctly. NoSuchLanguage There is no language by this name. NoSuchMailDirectory There is no mail directory by this name. NoSuchMod There is no mod by this name. NoSuchReflectionProperty There is no reflection property by this name. NoSuchReflectionVariable There is no reflection variable by this name. NoSuchScreensaver There is no screensaver by this name. NoSuchShellPreset There is no shell preset by this name. NoSuchTheme There is no theme by this name. NoSuchUser User doesn't exist. Check to make sure that you've written the user correctly. NotImplementedYet This function or feature is not implemented yet. NoteManagement There was an error when trying to perform an operation for the note management. NotificationManagement There was an error in the notification management. NullUsers There are zero users in the entire kernel. We've reached an extremely rare situation. The kernel can't continue. OldModDetected When the kernel tried to load the specified mod, it requested loading "Kernel Simulator". Since the main application is renamed to Nitrocid KS, this mod can't be run safely. We advice you to upgrade the mod. PermissionDenied Permission denied trying to perform an operation. You'll need to log in as a user that has the necessary permissions in order to be able to perform this operation. PermissionManagement An error occurred trying to manage permissions PrivacyConsent Invalid privacy consent operation. Please make sure that the consent is correct and try again. ProgressHandler The progress handler has failed to perform the requested operation. RSSNetwork The RSS network error occurred. Check to make sure that your internet connection is working. RSSShell The RSS shell error occurred. Reflection There was an error in the reflection system. RegularExpression A regular expression error happened while the text is being processed. Check your regular expression syntax and try again. If the time-out occurred, ensure that you don't recurse too much (don't be greedy). RemoteDebugDeviceAlreadyExists The remote debug device already exists. RemoteDebugDeviceNotFound The remote debug device is not found. Check to make sure that you've written an IP address of the device right. RemoteDebugDeviceOperation The remote debug device operation failed. RemoteProcedure An operation was attempted on the remote procedure system that is invalid. SFTPFilesystem A general SFTP filesystem error occurred. Check to make sure that the path specified is correct, and that the file or directory actually exists. SFTPNetwork A general SFTP network error occurred. Check to make sure that your internet connection is working. SFTPShell A general SFTP shell error occurred. ScreensaverManagement The screensaver management error occurred during the operation. Security The security operation failed to perform the required task. ShellOperation An invalid shell operation is being attempted. Splash Splash manager has failed to perform your requested operation. Please check the splash name and try again. SqlEditor An invalid SQL editor operation is being performed. Text Text tools failed to process your request. TextEditor An invalid text editor operation is being performed. ThemeManagement There was an error when trying to perform an operation for theme management. ThreadNotReadyYet The thread is not ready yet. The user code might have forgotten to regenerate the kernel thread after stopping it manually. ThreadOperation A thread operation is invalid in the current state. Refer to the additional message the kernel thread manager gave you for additional information. TimeDate An error occurred in the time and date module. Check to make sure that you've specified the time and the date correctly, and that the time zone exists. UESHConditionParse Condition parsing failed. Please check your syntax to meet the operator's expected design. UESHConditional A UESH condition system failed while performing the requested operation. See the error message below for more details. UESHScript An error occurred while trying to parse the UESH script file. Check your script file for errors and correct them. Unknown There was an unknown kernel error, possibly due to either the kernel exception type not being specified or something was wrong. UnsupportedConsole An unsupported console has been detected. UserCreation A user creation error occurred. UserManagement A user management error occurred. Widget There was an error when trying to process a widget system operation. If you're sure that this widget is registered properly, please make sure that you've written the widget class name properly.

api/Nitrocid.Kernel.Power.PowerMode.html.keywords: Enum PowerMode Kernel power modes Namespace: Nitrocid.Kernel.Power Assembly: Nitrocid.dll Syntax public enum PowerMode Fields Name Description Reboot Kernel will reboot RebootDebug Kernel will reboot to debug RebootMaintenance Kernel will reboot to maintenance mode (disables all mods and configs) RebootSafe Kernel will reboot to safe mode (disables all mods) RemoteRestart Kernel will remotely reboot another kernel on the network (if RPC is running here and there) RemoteRestartDebug Kernel will remotely reboot another kernel to safe mode on the network (if RPC is running here and there) RemoteRestartMaintenance Kernel will remotely reboot another kernel to safe mode on the network (if RPC is running here and there) RemoteRestartSafe Kernel will remotely reboot another kernel to safe mode on the network (if RPC is running here and there) RemoteShutdown Kernel will remotely shutdown another kernel on the network (if RPC is running here and there) Shutdown Kernel will shut down

index.html.title: | Nitrocid KS API - Aptivi
index.html.keywords: What is this web page? This webpage is an API documentation for developers to be used as reference. It constantly gets updated as we push new versions and new APIs, as well as updated documentation. If your IDE supports Intellisense, you don't need to open this web page. If you still intend to use a documentation specific to your preferred version, you may refer to the releases page of the project and download the attached <version>-doc.zip file. To get started using the documentation, select API Documentation from the top menu and select a namespace to get a clear overview of the API. Feedback If you wish to leave feedback to us about this API reference website, use the issue tracker of the project. If you wish to contribute to the documentation of the API, go to the project source code and make your improvements there on a draft Pull Request; we don't support override files that are made by clicking on Improve this doc. Any meaningful contributions are welcome, as long as they follow the code on conduct and contribution guidelines.
